Maroc - Deuxième Projet
            d'Alimentation en eau

abstracts.cdata!:
The primary objective of the Second
            Water Supply Project for Morocco is to improve access to
            safe water supplies to the population of the Mid-Atlantic
            Coast and the Greater Agadir area. It consists of: (i) the
            expansion of bulk water production and transmission
            facilities along the Mid-Atlantic Coast. These additional
            facilities will include the construction of two booster
            pumping stations along the existing transmission pipeline, a
            raw water pumping station with a capacity of 5
